patGuide.title: How to create a GitHub Personal Access Token:
patGuide.line1: 1. Go to GitHub Settings -> Developer settings
patGuide.line2: 2. Click Personal access tokens -> Fine Grained Tokens
patGuide.line7: 7. Selec the repository you wat to Use
patGuide.line9: 9. Select "Ccontent" amd make sure you gave "Reand and Write" permissions
patGuide.line11: 11. Copy and paste the token above
